ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I think more speakers can be invited to make a weekly or at least biweekly event.

Microbiology 702 01 is basically going to departmental seminars and listening to invited speakers discuss their research findings. Yes, I would recommend this course because it is so important for students to get an understanding of advanced research techniques that are being put into practice by other scientists in the field.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It deepened my knowledge of the discipline/profession by exposing me to more research done outside of the university. It was a great source of information on research being done in the field as a whole. I am not able to answer to what extent it contributed to my dissertation/research at this time, but I think that it will be invaluable in the future.
